summary: Adds a tartan pattern to the skirted/kilted section of the Companion\'s Wolf Armor. Included is the textures for the Male and Female versions of the armor.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Tartan Wolf Armor
Version: 1.01
Date: 12/26/2012
Category: Items, Objects and Clothes
Author(s): Cassidy Dorman
Source: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28962

Description
===========
This is a simple re-texture of the Vanilla Companions Wolf Armor, adding a tartan pattern to the skirted area of the armor.

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Drag-and-drop the contents of the \"Data\" folder into the \"Data\" folder of your Skyrim install.
3. Overwrite if prompted.

Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the following files:
Data\\textures\\armor\\wolf\\wolfarmorf.dds
Data\\textures\\armor\\wolf\\wolfarmorm.dds


Incompatibility
===============
Will most likely conflict with any mod that modifies the same textures. Haven\'t tested, but haven\'t really needed to since this mod fit my personal needs. If there is an incompatibility found, please contact me and I will note it in a later README.


History
=======
1.0: 12/26/2012 - I released the dang thing.
1.01: 12/28/2012 - Created texture using the tartan of Clan Fletcher (for Fletchman1313)

Contact
=======

Skyrim Nexus: cassidydorman
Email: cassidy.dorman@live.com
Facebook: http://facebook.com/cassidy.dorman

Credits
=======

Thanks to Bethesda Softworks for making Skyrim.
Thanks to Adobe for making Photoshop CS5.
Thanks to NVidia for making the Photoshop DDS Plugin.
Thanks to NifTools for NifSkope.
Thanks to the NexusMods and it\'s community for the amazing gameplay enhancements.

Tools Used
==========

BSAOpt - http://obge.paradice-insight.us/wiki/BSAopt
NIFSkope - http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope
PhotoshopCS5 - http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that 
you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod. I would also like
to know what mods are including my work.
author: Cassidy Dorman
